0: We have stayed in hotels in the US Europe Asia and Africa but this is the cleanest most comfortable and friendliest staff of them all
I had to clean the top of the night table and desk upon arrival
It was clean the staff was friendly
The beds were extremely comfortable the staff friendly and efficient
The check in employee was very welcoming and professional
A front desk staff went out of her way and got us muffins anyway
Very clean staff is very friendly and manager always helpful
I was able to store my suitcase while I explored the town so staff were helpful
1: The staff went above and beyond to try and get me into my room as early as they could
The staff is nice and tries their best but can not keep the quality above water even for a bargain hotel

Lastly I want to thank Courtney for helping me and my friend girl when we first got there with that great customer service thank you for the heads up also I now see that you guys are very strict about smoking not cigarette bust tobacco but smoking b
The service was great but the hotel was very run down
Desk clerk think her name was King was very pleasant
The lady at the front desk had the nastiest attitude
So I called the front desk and told the clerk
2: We told the night attendant and we were told oh we let who ever park there
There was only one chair in the room and it blocked the way to one bed if it was not tucked under the desk
That was my fault though because I did not bother to call the front desk about it
The pool was honestly the best facility but the staff was incredibly kind
Only thing that I was disappointed in was when we arrived we were very tired and there was not anyone at the check in desk
asked the front desk about it said could not move us to another room
The lady at the front desk downstairs moved us to another room that was better but I still felt a little uncomfortable about what had happened as far as a roach
